title: Return to the Scene of the Crime: A Guide to Infamous Places in Chicago
description: Return to the Scene of the a Guide to Infamous Places in Chicago, by Richard Lindberg, is an uncensored neighborhood-by-neighborhood map to the back alleys and boulevards of Chicago where some of the most infamous events of the city's criminal past occurred. Capone, Dillinger, and other organized crime figures have left an indelible imprint on the Windy City.
author: Richard Lindberg
